song.title: There is None Like You
song.lyrics:
[c] .G D C G There is none like You .C G Am7 Dsus D No one else can touch my heart like You do || .G D C I could search for all eternity long and find .G D G There is none like You
[v] . Cmaj7 C G Em7 Your mercy flows like a river wide . Am7 D G And healing comes from Your hands || .Cmaj7 C G Em7 Suffering children are safe in Your arms .Am7 C D There is none like You
